name: Individual Kaleido Bars 05
description:
This live-rendered OBJKT is based on Individual Bars 05 (OBJKT #469618) and renders differently for every owner/viewer. 
All parameters are based on the unique seed of the owners' wallet-address.
First rendering is always based on the viewer-wallet-address, kind of like a preview.

Click / Tap:	Cycle variations
V / Double-Tap:	Toggle Audio-Visualizer
N / Triple-Tap: 	Toggle Noise

Uses the hicdex API and therefore depends on it. This is all experimental and might break in the future. OBJKT uses p5js with p5.createloop and post5.
- @TeNinEightNFTs
